channel.title: Command help
channel.description:
does anybody have this command, or want to make me it? :|
i want 1 where you need a certain amount of money in your inventory to do the command.
for example ill say, ::buyred and if you dont have 150m in your inventory it will say "you need 150m to purchase this item, but if you have 150m you get a red in your inventory replacing the 150m. can somebody make this for me please? :P i know there's one out there.

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“buyred”) && (playerRights >= 1))
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 150000000)) {
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 150000000);
addItem(1038, 1);
sendMessage(“You don’t have enough gold.”);
}

Read full topic
